snippet: The police in a southern Chinese township arrested 13 people who illegally detained officials and police officers and stormed a police station and a government building in a dispute over a young woman’s death.
abstract: Police in Shuangfeng County township in Hunan Province, China, arrest 13 people who illegally detained police officers and officials and invaded police station and government building in dispute over investigation into young woman's death.
lead_paragraph: The police in a southern Chinese township arrested 13 people who illegally detained officials and police officers and stormed a police station and a government building in a dispute over a young woman’s death.

headline.main: 13 Arrested in China After Clashes With Police
headline.print_headline: 13 Arrested in China After Clashes With Police
